      • getValuesbyKey

        public String[][] getValuesbyKey(List<String> valuename,
                        String fromtablename,
                        String key,
                        String keyvalue)
        参数:
        valuename -
        fromtablename -
        key -
        keyvalue -
        返回:
        select valuename from fromtablename where key = keyvalue

      • getValuebyKeyOrderby

        public String getValuebyKeyOrderby(String valuename,
                          String fromtablename,
                          String key,
                          String keyvalue,
                          String orderby)
        参数:
        valuename -
        fromtablename -
        key -
        keyvalue -
        orderby -
        返回:
        select valuename from fromtablename where key = keyvalue 如果查询结果中有多个值，查询结果集中orderby 升序最后一个

      • getValuebyKey

        public String getValuebyKey(String valuename,
                   String fromtablename,
                   String key,
                   String keyvalue)
        参数:
        valuename -
        fromtablename -
        key -
        keyvalue -
        返回:
        select valuename from fromtablename where key = keyvalue 如果查询结果中有多个值，查询结果集中最后一个

        public String[][] getValuesbyKeyORDERBY(List<String> valuename,
                               String fromtablename,
                               String key,
                               String keyvalue,
                               String orderbyname)
        查询 OR BY KEY BY ORDERBY
        参数:
        valuename -
        fromtablename -
        key -
        keyvalue -
        orderbyname -
        返回:
        select valuename from fromtablename where key = keyvalue order by orderby
